name: Bitrot
description:
You are Babbit, hero of the classic platformer Babbit's Grotto. 

For decades, you have lived cheerfully as the master of your colorful world on a 3-in-1 cartridge. 

Clovers? Eat 'em! Mushrooms? Stomp 'em!

But cartridges don't last forever, and strange things are starting to happen... 

What's a deer to do when the world stops making sense?

Controls

⬅️ — Left arrow

➡️ — Right arrow

Jump — Space bar

Team

Bitrot was developed by Team Babbit for Ludum Dare 49. The theme was "unstable."
